sentence: Senators Chris Van Hollen and Ben Cardin and Congressmen Steny H.
Speaker, it is with great honor that I rise today to  co-anchor the CBC Special Order along with my distinguished colleague,  Representative Steny Hoyer of Maryland.
Senators Chris Van Hollen and Ben Cardin and Congressmen Steny H.
Senators Ben Cardin and Chris Van Hollen and Congressman Steny H.

I begin by offering my gratitude to everyone who put in the long  hours and late nights to craft this package: Ranking Member Steny Hoyer  of Financial Services and Lois Frankel on National Security-Department  of State, who led these negotiations and secured important provisions  which we could all be proud of.
Senators Chris Van Hollen and Ben Cardin and Congressmen Steny H.
Some of those legendary Members include, of  course, Speaker Emerita Nancy Pelosi, Steny Hoyer, the great  Jim  Clyburn, Maxine Waters, Elijah Cummings, and Charlie Rangel.
My chief of staff said: If there was ever a Democratic Member of  Congress who literally represents the term ``statesman,'' it is Steny  Hoyer.
Speaker, I also offer my personal thanks and  congratulations to my dear friend, Steny Hoyer, on the announcement  that he has made today.
I thank their accompanying ranking members, Representative Steny  Hoyer and Lois Frankel, for their professionalism and engagement in the  process.
